plot: Pitt and Weem live on a rubbish dump. It's an idyllic life but for one thing - the neighbors. When there are a hundred ravenous gulls after your food, you have to have to be smarter than your average rodent to keep it.
title: Pitt and Weem
plot_es: Pitt and Weem live on a rubbish dump. It's an idyllic life but for one thing - the neighbors. When there are a hundred ravenous gulls after your food, you have to have to be smarter than your average rodent to keep it.
